nodes.description: 巴塞罗那Hipercor百货公司停车场发生汽车炸弹爆炸，造成15人死亡、39人受伤
nodes.support_text: A car bomb exploded in a department store parking garage here today, killing 15 people and wounding 39, the authorities said.

nodes.description: 匿名电话称爆炸由巴斯克分离主义组织ETA负责，由西班牙新闻 agency EFE报道
nodes.support_text: A telephone caller said the Basque separatist organization E.T.A. was responsible, the Spanish news agency EFE reported.

nodes.description: 此次爆炸是ETA自1968年暴力独立运动开始以来宣称的最致命袭击
nodes.support_text: The bombing is the deadliest to be claimed by E.T.A. since it began its violent campaign for independence in 1968.

nodes.description: ETA此前宣称制造的死亡事件总数接近600起，受害者主要为警察和军人
nodes.support_text: Before today, the Basque group had taken responsibility for killing nearly 600 people, but most of their victims were police officers, Civil Guards and military officers.

nodes.description: 西班牙首相费利佩·冈萨雷斯中断巴西访问紧急回国应对事件
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Felipe Gonzalez cut short a visit to Brazil to return to Spain.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致停车场天花板坍塌并引发火灾，浓烟弥漫多楼层
nodes.support_text: The explosion caused a ceiling to collapse in a shopping area of the Hipercor department store in central Barcelona and started a fire that filled several levels of the parking garage with smoke.

nodes.description: 巴塞罗那民事总督宣布7人遇难，包括5名男性、5名女性和3名儿童
nodes.support_text: The civil governor of Barcelona, Ferran Cardenal, said seven men, five women and three children were killed.

nodes.description: 冈萨雷斯向记者陈述事件
政府试图迫使对方政府改变策略
nodes.support_text: 政府试图迫使对方政府改变策略

nodes.description: 政府拒绝向无差别暴力让步
nodes.support_text: 政府拒绝向无差别暴力让步

nodes.description: 政府继续打击恐怖主义
nodes.support_text: 政府继续打击恐怖主义

edges.support_text: A telephone caller said the Basque separatist organization E.T.A. was responsible, the Spanish news agency EFE reported.
The bombing is the deadliest to be claimed by E.T.A. since it began its violent campaign for independence in 1968.
The explosion caused a ceiling to collapse in a shopping area of the Hipercor department store in central Barcelona and started a fire that filled several levels of the parking garage with smoke.
Before today, the Basque group had taken responsibility for killing nearly 600 people, but most of their victims were police officers, Civil Guards and military officers.
The civil governor of Barcelona, Ferran Cardenal, said seven men, five women and three children were killed.
冈萨雷斯在回国后向记者陈述
The explosion caused a ceiling to collapse in a shopping area of the Hipercor department store in central Barcelona and started a fire that filled several levels of the parking garage with smoke.
陈述后政府开始调整策略
尝试调整策略后转为强制措施
强制措施引发拒绝暴力对话
拒绝暴力后持续反恐行动
持续打击恐怖主义升级为系统性行动
